src: W przeważającej mierze praca była natury teoretycznej, ale program został napisany na potrzeby symulowania obserwacji galaktyki w gwiazdozbiorze Strzelca. Poszukiwany przez zespół efekt byłby powodowany siłami pływowymi pomiędzy ciemną materią galaktyki a ciemną materią Drogi Mlecznej. Tak jak Księżyc wpływa na Ziemię i powoduje pływy, tak samo Droga Mleczna działa swoją siłą na galaktykę Strzelca. Naukowcy zdołali wyciągnąć wniosek, że ciemna materia wpływa na inną ciemną materię tak, jak standardowa materia. Ta teoria mówi, że większość ciemnej materii otacza galaktykę jak pewnego rodzaju aureola, złożona z wielu małych cząsteczek.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the galaxy in the constellation of the Centaur. The effect sought by the team would be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Just as the Moon affects the Earth and causes tides, so the Milky Way acts on the Centaur galaxy. Scientists were able to draw the conclusion that dark matter affects other dark matter as standard matter. This theory says that most of the dark matter surrounds the galaxy like a kind of halo, composed of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Dyskusję sprowokowała kontrowersja dotycząca funduszu na pomoc i odbudowę po przejściu huraganu Katrina; niektórzy spośród podatkowych konserwatystów określili to żartobliwie mianem „Układu Busha z Nowym Orleanem”. Krytyka liberałów dotycząca działań w ramach rekonstrukcji koncentrowała się na udzielaniu kontraktów na rekonstrukcję osobom postrzeganym jako powiązane z Waszyngtonem.
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized by some tax-cutting conservatives as the "Bush-Orleans Pact". Liberal criticism of the reconstruction efforts focused on contracts being awarded to persons perceived as connected to Washington.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

Krytyka liberałów dotycząca działań w ramach rekonstrukcji koncentrowała się na udzielaniu kontraktów na rekonstrukcję osobom postrzeganym jako powiązane z Waszyngtonem.

src: Gdy kapsuła dotrze do Ziemi i wejdzie w atmosferę około 5 rano czasu wschodniego, powinna zafundować imponujący pokaz świetlny dla ludzi mieszkających w Północnej Karolinie, Oregonie, Nevadzie i Utah. Kapsuła będzie przypominać spadającą gwiazdę, która przecina niebo w swoim locie. Kapsuła będzie podróżować z prędkością 12,8 km albo 8 mil na sekundę, to na tyle szybko, by w minutę dotrzeć z San Francisco do Los Angeles. Stardust ustanowi nowy rekord szybkości powrotu statku kosmicznego na Ziemię, a tym samym pobije rekord ustanowiony w maju 1969 roku przez moduł dowodzenia Apollo X. „Przeleci nad zachodnie wybrzeże północnej Kalifornii i rozjaśni niebo od Kalifornii przez środkowy Oregon, a potem przez Nevadę, Idaho aż po Utah” – rzekł Tom Duxbury, dyrektor projektu Stardust.
mt: When the capsule arrives on Earth and enters the atmosphere around 5 a.m. Eastern time, it should provide an impressive light show for people living in North Carolina, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will resemble a falling star, which cuts through the sky in its flight. The capsule will travel at a speed of 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to reach San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record for the speed of a spacecraft's return to Earth, and thus break the record set in May 1969 by the Apollo X command module. "It will fly over the west coast of North Carolina and brighten the sky from California through central Oregon, then Nevada, Idaho and Utah" - said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project director.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Gdy kapsuła dotrze do Ziemi i wejdzie w atmosferę około 5 rano czasu wschodniego, powinna zafundować imponujący pokaz świetlny dla ludzi mieszkających w Północnej Karolinie, Oregonie, Nevadzie i Utah. Kapsuła będzie przypominać spadającą gwiazdę, która przecina niebo w swoim locie. Kapsuła będzie podróżować z prędkością 12,8 km albo 8 mil na sekundę, to na tyle szybko, by w minutę dotrzeć z San Francisco do Los Angeles. Stardust ustanowi nowy rekord szybkości powrotu statku kosmicznego na Ziemię, a tym samym pobije rekord ustanowiony w maju 1969 roku przez moduł dowodzenia Apollo X. „Przeleci nad zachodnie wybrzeże północnej Kalifornii i rozjaśni niebo od Kalifornii przez środkowy Oregon, a potem przez Nevadę, Idaho aż po Utah” – rzekł Tom Duxbury, dyrektor projektu Stardust.
mt: When the capsule arrives on Earth and enters the atmosphere around 5 a.m. Eastern time, it should provide an impressive light show for people living in North Carolina, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will resemble a falling star, which cuts through the sky in its flight. The capsule will travel at a speed of 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to reach San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record for the speed of a spacecraft's return to Earth, and thus break the record set in May 1969 by the Apollo X command module. "It will fly over the west coast of North Carolina and brighten the sky from California through central Oregon, then Nevada, Idaho and Utah" - said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project director.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Lekarka pracująca w Szpitalu Dziecięcym w Pittsburgu w Pensylwanii zostanie oskarżona o morderstwo z premedytacją, po tym jak w środę w bagażniku jej samochodu znaleziono zwłoki jej matki – oświadczyły władze Ohio. Dr Malar Balasubramanian, lat 29, został odnaleziony w Blue Ash w Ohio, na przedmieściach około 15 mil na północ od Cincinnati, gdzie leżał na ziemi obok drogi, w podkoszulku i bieliźnie, najwyraźniej pod mocnym wpływem leków. Pokierowała funkcjonariuszy do swojego czarnego Oldsmobile Intrigue zaparkowanego 500 stóp dalej. Tam znaleźli ciało 53-letniej Saroji Balasubramanian okryte zakrwawionymi kocami. Policja poinformowała, że ciało znajdowało się tam około doby.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, who worked at the Children's Hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with premeditated murder after her mother's body was found in the trunk of her car Wednesday, officials in Ohio announced. Balasubramanian was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, where he was lying on the ground next to the road, in a T-shirt and underwear, apparently under the influence of drugs. He directed police to his black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was parked 500 feet away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroji Balasubramanian covered in bloody towels. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: To jest największe przejęcie w historii eBaya. Przedsiębiorstwo ma nadzieję zróżnicować źródła dochodów i osiągnąć popularność na terenach, na których Skype ma mocną pozycję, takich jak Chiny, Europa Wschodnia i Brazylia.
mt: This is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify revenue sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Kiedy po przywiezieniu rannych do szpitala walki ustały, około 40 pozostałych więźniów zostało na dziedzińcu, nie zgadzając się na powrót do własnych cel. Negocjatorzy usiłowali wyjaśnić sytuację, ale żądania więźniów są niejasne. Więźniowie wzniecili pożar na dziedzińcu między 22:00 a 23:00 czasu MDT. Chwilę później funkcjonariusze w rynsztunku bojowym wkroczyli na dziedziniec i okrążyli więźniów, używając przy tym gazu łzawiącego. Załogi straży pożarnej ostatecznie ugasiły ogień przed godz. 23:35.
mt: 40 inmates refused to return to their cells after the shooting stopped, and negotiations to explain the situation failed. Inmates started a fire on the yard between 22:00 and 23:00 MDT. Shortly after, tactical officers entered the yard and surrounded the inmates, using pepper spray. Firefighters eventually extinguished the fire before 23:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: W tych komentarzach nadawanych na żywo w telewizji po raz pierwszy padło stwierdzenie z poważnych irańskich źródeł na temat skutków sankcji. Są to m.in. restrykcje finansowe i wydany przez Unię Europejską zakaz eksportu ropy naftowej, która odpowiada za 80% dochodu zagranicznego w gospodarce Iranu. W najnowszym miesięcznym raporcie OPEC podaje, że eksport ropy naftowej spadł do poziomu najniższego od dwóch dekad i wynosi 2,8 miliona baryłek dziennie. Naczelny lider kraju, ajatollah Ali Chamenei, nazwał zależność od ropy naftowej „pułapką” wywodzącą się z czasów przed rewolucją islamską w Iranie z 1979 roku i stwierdził, że państwo powinno się z niej wyzwolić.
mt: In these live comments on television for the first time, there was a statement from serious Iranian sources about the effects of sanctions. These are, among others, financial restrictions and the oil export ban issued by the European Union, which accounts for 80% of Iran's foreign income. In the latest OPEC monthly report, it is stated that oil exports have fallen to the lowest level in two decades and are at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's top leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, called dependence on oil "a trap" dating back to the time before the Islamic Revolution in Iran in 1979 and stated that the country should free itself from it.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: We Francji głosowanie było zwykle czynnością mało zaawansowaną technicznie: wyborcy oddają głos w kabinie, a wydrukowaną kartę z oznaczeniem wybranego przez siebie kandydata wkładają do koperty. Gdy urzędnicy sprawdzą tożsamość wyborcy, wrzuca on kopertę do urny i składa podpis na liście głosujących. Francuskie prawo wyborcze dość ściśle określa procedury. Od roku 1988 urny wyborcze muszą być przezroczyste, aby wyborcy i obserwatorzy nie mieli wątpliwości, że w momencie otwarcia lokalu wyborczego w urnie nie ma żadnych kopert i że nie są do niej wrzucane żadne koperty z wyjątkiem kopert należycie policzonych i upoważnionych wyborców. Kandydaci mają możliwość wysłania swoich przedstawicieli, aby obserwowali każdy etap procesu. Wieczorem głosy są liczone przez wolontariuszy pozostających pod ścisłym nadzorem i zgodnie z określonymi procedurami.
mt: In France, the voting process was usually a fairly low-tech affair: voters cast their ballots in a booth, and deposited the printed ballot with the candidate of their choice into a ballot box. When election officials verified the voter's identity, they deposited the ballot box into a ballot box and signed a list of voters. French election law quite strictly defines the procedures. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent, so that voters and observers have no doubt that when the polling station is opened, there are no ballot boxes in the box and that no ballot boxes are being deposited other than those properly counted and authorized voters. Candidates have the ability to send their representatives to observe each step of the process. In the evening, the votes are counted by volunteers under strict supervision and in accordance with the defined procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Jeśli zostanie to potwierdzone, odkrycie to umożliwi zakończenie ośmioletnich poszukiwań Musashi przez Allena. Obrazowanie dna morskiego umożliwiło odnalezienie wraku z użyciem zdalnie sterowanego pojazdu podwodnego. Z doniesień wynika, że Allen, jeden z najbogatszych ludzi na świecie, poświęcił znaczną część swojego majątku na eksploracje morskie i zainicjował poszukiwania okrętu pancernego Musashi, powodowany długoletnią fascynacją II wojną światową.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery will end an eight-year search for Musashi by Allen. The ocean floor was imaged using a remotely operated underwater vehicle. From reports, Allen, one of the richest people in the world, has devoted a significant portion of his fortune to ocean exploration and initiated the search for the battleship Musashi, driven by a long-standing fascination with World War II.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: W doniesieniach telewizyjnych widać biały dym wydobywający się z elektrowni. Lokalne władze ostrzegają osoby zamieszkałe w okolicy zakładu, zalecając, by pozostać w domach, wyłączyć klimatyzację i nie pić wody z kranu. Jak twierdzi japońska agencja nuklearna, w elektrowni wykryto radioaktywny cez oraz jod. Władze spekulują, że to może wskazywać na pęknięcie i przeciekanie pojemników z paliwem uranowym na miejscu.
mt: In television reports, white smoke is seen coming from the power plant. Local authorities warn residents in the area of the plant to stay in their homes, turn off air conditioning and not drink water from the tap. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant. Authorities speculate that this may indicate a breach and leakage of the uranium fuel containers on site.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll wykrył niezwykle lekoodporną gruźlicę (XDR-TB) w południowoafrykańskim rejonie KwaZulu-Natal. W wywiadzie oznajmił, że nowy wariant był „bardzo problematyczny i niepokojący ze względu na wysoki wskaźnik śmiertelności”. Zdaniem doktora Molla niektórzy pacjenci mogli złapać wirusa w szpitalu, a przynajmniej dwóch z nich było pracownikami opieki zdrowotnej zatrudnionymi w szpitalu. W ciągu roku osoba zarażona może zarazić od 10 do 15 osób, z którymi miała bliski kontakt. Jednak odsetek XDR-TB w grupie ludzi z gruźlicą wciąż wydaje się niski, w każdej chwili w RPA jest 6000 z 330 000 zakażonych.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered an extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview he said the new strain was "very problematic and worrying because of the high mortality rate". Dr Moll's opinion is that some patients may have caught the virus in the hospital, and at least two of them were health care workers employed in the hospital. In a year an infected person can infect from 10 to 15 people with whom he had close contact. However, the rate of XDR-TB in the group of people with tuberculosis still seems low, in South Africa there are 6000 of 330 000 infected.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: Dr Tony Moll wykrył niezwykle lekoodporną gruźlicę (XDR-TB) w południowoafrykańskim rejonie KwaZulu-Natal. W wywiadzie oznajmił, że nowy wariant był „bardzo problematyczny i niepokojący ze względu na wysoki wskaźnik śmiertelności”. Zdaniem doktora Molla niektórzy pacjenci mogli złapać wirusa w szpitalu, a przynajmniej dwóch z nich było pracownikami opieki zdrowotnej zatrudnionymi w szpitalu. W ciągu roku osoba zarażona może zarazić od 10 do 15 osób, z którymi miała bliski kontakt. Jednak odsetek XDR-TB w grupie ludzi z gruźlicą wciąż wydaje się niski, w każdej chwili w RPA jest 6000 z 330 000 zakażonych.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered an extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview he said the new strain was "very problematic and worrying because of the high mortality rate". Dr Moll's opinion is that some patients may have caught the virus in the hospital, and at least two of them were health care workers employed in the hospital. In a year an infected person can infect from 10 to 15 people with whom he had close contact. However, the rate of XDR-TB in the group of people with tuberculosis still seems low, in South Africa there are 6000 of 330 000 infected.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen jest systemem, który wg FAA umożliwiłby samolotom loty na krótszych trasach, miliony galonów paliwa oszczędności i zredukowanie emisji dwutlenku węgla. Użycie technologii satelitarnej zamiast technologii radarowej starszej generacji pozwala kontrolerom ruchu lotniczego lokalizować samoloty z większą precyzją i przekazywać pilotom bardziej szczegółowe informacje.
mt: NextGen is a system that, according to FAA, would allow aircraft to fly on shorter routes, millions of gallons of fuel savings and reduce carbon dioxide emissions. Use of satellite technology instead of the older generation radar technology allows air traffic controllers to locate aircraft with greater precision and provide pilots with more detailed information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Historycy krytykowali dotychczasową politykę FBI, skupiającą zasoby na sprawach łatwych do rozwiązania, zwłaszcza kradzieżach samochodów, w celu zwiększenia wskaźnika stopnia skuteczności agencji. Kongres rozpoczął finansowanie inicjatywy dotyczącej obsceniczności w roku fiskalnym 2005, określając, że FBI ma przeznaczyć 10 agentów ds. pornografii z udziałem dorosłych.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's previous policy of focusing its resources on easy-to-solve cases, especially car thefts, in order to increase the agency's effectiveness index. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal year 2005, specifying that the FBI should allocate 10 adult pornography agents.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Samolot JAS 39C Gripen rozbił się na pasie startowym w przybliżeniu o godz. 9:30 czasu lokalnego (02:30 UTC) i wybuchł, przez co lotnisko zostało zamknięte dla lotów komercyjnych. Pilota zidentyfikowano jako Dilokrita Pattavee, dowódcę eskadry. Według doniesień z lokalnych mediów lotniskowy wóz strażacki wywrócił się podczas interwencji.
mt: 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Dilokrit Pattavee, the squadron commander. According to local media reports, the airport fire truck overturned during the intervention.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: W latach sześćdziesiątych Brzeziński był doradcą Johna F. Kennedy'ego, a później pracował w administracji Lyndona B. Johnsona. W czasie wyborów w 1976 roku był doradcą Cartera w kwestiach polityki zagranicznej, później zajmował stanowisko doradcy ds. bezpieczeństwa narodowego w latach 1977–1981, przejmując pałeczkę od Henry'ego Kissingera. Będąc doradcą ds. bezpieczeństwa narodowego (NSA) pomagał Carterowi w dyplomatycznym prowadzeniu spraw światowych, takich jak porozumienie z Camp David, 1978; normalizacja stosunków na linii USA-Chiny pod koniec lat 70.; rewolucja w Iranie, która była przyczyną kryzysu z zakładnikami w Iranie, 1979; oraz radziecka inwazja na Afganistan, 1979.
mt: In the 1960s Brzezinski was an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later worked in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. During the 1976 election he was an advisor to Carter on foreign policy, later taking the baton from Henry Kissinger as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981. As National Security Advisor (NSA) he helped Carter in diplomatic matters such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of relations between the United States and China at the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which was the cause of the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Bobek, który przyszedł na świat w Zagrzebiu, stolicy Chorwacji, stał się sławny dzięki grze w klubie Partizan Belgrad. Był z nimi od roku 1945 do 1958. Gdy występował w drużynie, zdobył 403 gole w 468 spotkaniach. Nikt nie rozegrał tylu meczów ani nie strzelił tylu goli dla klubu co Bobek. W 1995 roku wybrano go najlepszym graczem w historii Partizana.
mt: Bobek, who was born in Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, became famous for his game in the Partizan Belgrade club. He was with them from 1945 to 1958. When he played in the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No one played as many matches or scored as many goals for the club as Bobek. In 1995, he was voted the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae jest gatunekiem z rodziny Dromaeosauridae, spokrewnionym z Velociraptorem. Wszystko wskazuje na to, że ten w całości opierzony i ciepłokrwisty ptak z grupy drapieżników poruszał się w pozycji pionowej na dwóch nogach i miał pazury podobne do welociraptora. Jego drugi szpon był większy, stąd nazwa Hesperonychus, oznaczająca „zachodni szpon”.
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae, related to Velociraptor. It was completely feathered and warm-blooded, bipedal and had claws similar to Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, hence the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: W przyjęciu zorganizowanym z okazji pierwszej rocznicy ślubu wzięło udział co najmniej 100 osób. Urzędnicy oznajmili, że oficjalne wydarzenie z okazji rocznicy zaplanowano w późniejszym terminie. Pobrali się w Teksasie rok temu i przyjechali do Buffalo, żeby świętować z krewnymi i znajomymi. Urodzony w Buffalo 30-letni mąż był jednym z czterech zabitych w strzelaninie, za to jego żona nie odniosła obrażeń.
mt: 100 people attended the reception to celebrate the first anniversary of their marriage. Officials announced that the official anniversary event was planned for a later date. They married in Texas last year and came to Buffalo to celebrate with family and friends. The Buffalo-born 30-year-old husband was one of four killed in a shooting, while his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno transportował 120–160 metrów sześciennych paliwa, gdy doszło do awarii i silne podmuchy wiatru w połączeniu z falami zepchnęły go na falochron. Helikoptery ocaliły dwunastu członków załogi; jedynym odniesionym obrażeniem był złamany nos. Stumetrowy statek zmierzał po odbiór standardowego ładunku z nawozem i na początku urzędnicy mieli obawy, że może dojść do wycieku.
mt: 120–160 cubic metres of fuel was being transported when the accident occurred and strong gusts of wind in combination with waves pushed it onto the breakwater. Helicopters rescued twelve crew members; the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre vessel was on its way to receive a standard load of cargo and at first officials were concerned that there may be a spill.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Oprócz reżyserii do osiągnięć Vautiera należy strajk głodowy w 1973 roku przeciw temu, co określał jako cenzurę polityczną. Zmieniono francuskie prawo. Jego aktywizm rozpoczął się, gdy miał 15 lat, gdy wstąpił do francuskiego ruchu oporu w czasie II wojny światowej. Udokumentował samego siebie w książeczce z 1998 r. W latach 60. powrócił do wolnej Algierii, by nauczać reżyserii filmowej.
mt: In addition to directing, Vautier is known for his 1973 hunger strike against what he called political censorship. French law was changed. His activism began when he was 15, joining the French resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s, he returned to free Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Na pogrzebie w Rzymie zebrało się ponad cztery miliony ludzi. Liczba obecnych osób była tak duża, że nie każdy mógł uczestniczyć w pogrzebie na Placu Św. Piotra. W Rzymie zainstalowano kilka dużych ekranów telewizyjnych, co umożliwiło ludziom oglądanie ceremonii. Ogromne rzesze ludzi gromadziły się przed takimi telebimami również w wielu innych miastach we Włoszech i na całym świecie, a szczególnie w Polsce.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. The number of people present was so large that not everyone could participate in the funeral on St. Peter's Square. In Rome, several large television screens were installed, which allowed people to watch the ceremony. Huge crowds gathered in front of such telebims also in many other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Zgodnie z informacjami podanymi do wiadomości publicznej w mieszkaniu przy Macbeth Street doszło do eksplozji z powodu ulatniającego się gazu. Pracownik gazowni zjawił się na miejscu zdarzenia po zgłoszeniu przez sąsiada, że gaz się ulatnia. Gdy przybył urzędnik, w mieszkaniu nastąpił wybuch. Nie zgłoszono żadnych większych obrażeń, ale co najmniej pięć osób obecnych na miejscu wybuchu doznało szoku. W mieszkaniu nie było nikogo. W tym czasie zorganizowano ewakuację prawie 100 mieszkańców z tego obszaru.
mt: According to reports, a gas leak caused an explosion at a house on Macbeth Street. A gas company employee arrived at the scene after a neighbor reported a gas leak. When the employee arrived, an explosion occurred. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people present at the explosion suffered shock. No one was home at the time. In the meantime, an evacuation of almost 100 residents from the area was organized.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Ofiarami śmiertelnymi są Nicholas Alden, lat 25, oraz Zachary Cuddeback, lat 21. Cuddeback prowadził pojazd. Edgar Veguilla odniósł obrażenia ręki i szczęki, a Kristoffer Schneider potrzebował operacji rekonstrukcji twarzy. Broń Uka, wycelowana w głowę piątego mężczyzny, zawiodła. Schneider odczuwa ciągły ból, nie widzi na jedno oko, brakuje mu kawałka czaszki, a twarz ma odbudowaną z tytanu. Schneider składał zeznania za pośrednictwem wideokonferencji z bazy USAF w swojej ojczyźnie.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed in the crash. Cuddeback was driving the vehicle. Edgar Veguilla suffered a hand and jaw injury, and Kristoffer Schneider needed reconstructive surgery. The Uka gun, aimed at the head of the fifth man, missed. Schneider feels constant pain, cannot see out of one eye, is missing a piece of his skull, and his face has been rebuilt with titanium. Schneider gave testimony via videoconference from a USAF base in his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: I golf, i rugby powrócą na Igrzyska Olimpijskie. Międzynarodowy Komitet Olimpijski na posiedzeniu zarządu w Berlinie przegłosował dziś włączenie tej dyscypliny. Rugby, a konkretnie związek rugby, i golf wygrały z pięcioma innymi sportami, które brano pod uwagę jako dyscypliny olimpijskie. Chciano włączyć squasha, karate oraz sporty rolkowe do programu olimpijskiego, podobnie jak baseball oraz softball, które wykluczono z igrzysk olimpijskich w 2005 roku. Wynik głosowania musi zostać zatwierdzony przez MKOl w pełnym składzie podczas październikowego spotkania w Kopenhadze.
mt: Golf and rugby will return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee approved the inclusion of rugby at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, and the rugby union, won the vote over five other sports that were being considered for inclusion in the Olympic program. Squash, karate and roller sports were also in the running, as were baseball and softball, which were dropped from the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must be ratified by the IOC in full session in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 24 września 1759 roku Arthur Guinness podpisał umowę wynajęcia browaru St James' Gate w Dublinie na 9000 lat. 250 lat później Guinness rozwinął się do biznesu światowego, którego obroty wynoszą ponad 10 miliardów euro (14,7 miliarda dolarów) rocznie.
mt: 24 September 1759 Arthur Guinness signed a lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin for 9,000 years. 250 years later Guinness had grown into a global business with revenues of over 10 billion euros (14.7 billion dollars) a year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Zostało potwierdzone, iż zabójczy dla ludzi szczep wirusa ptasiej grypy, H5N1, zakaził zdechłą dziką kaczkę, odnalezioną w poniedziałek na moczarach pod Lyonem na wschodzie Francji. Austria, Niemcy, Słowenia, Bułgaria, Grecja, Włochy i, jako siódmy kraj w Unii Europejskiej, Francja potwierdziły obecność wirusa na swoim terytorium. Nie potwierdzono podejrzewanych przypadków H5N1 w Chorwacji i Danii.
mt: It was confirmed that the deadly for humans strain of the bird flu virus, H5N1, infected a dead wild duck found on Monday in marshes near Lyon in eastern France. Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece, Italy and, as the seventh country in the European Union, France confirmed the presence of the virus on their territory. No suspected cases of H5N1 were confirmed in Croatia and Denmark.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Oddziały pokojowe ONZ przybyłe na Haiti po trzęsieniu ziemi w 2010 roku są obarczane winą za rozprzestrzenienie choroby, której ognisko wybuchło w pobliżu bazy wojskowej. Zgodnie z pozwem nieczystości z obozu ONZ nie zostały właściwie zdezynfekowane i z tego powodu bakterie dostały się do dopływu rzeki Artibonite, która jest jedną z największych na Haiti. Przed pojawieniem się oddziałów wojskowych Haiti nie doświadczyło problemów związanych z tą chorobą od czasów XIX stulecia. Haitański Instytut Sprawiedliwości i Demokracji odniósł się do niezależnych badań sugerujących, że nepalski batalion pokojowy ONZ bezwiednie przeniósł chorobę na Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, ekspert ONZ od tej choroby, powiedziała, że wybuch epidemii spowodowały prawdopodobnie siły pokojowe.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are being blamed for spreading the disease, whose outbreak occurred near a military base. According to the lawsuit, the UN forces' waste was not properly decontaminated and as a result, the bacteria entered the Artibonite River, one of the largest in Haiti. Haiti had not experienced problems with this disease since the 19th century. The Haitian Institute of Justice and Democracy referred to independent studies suggesting that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unwittingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on this disease, said that the outbreak of the epidemic was probably caused by the peacekeeping forces.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Rząd Irlandii podkreśla konieczność wydania ustawy, aby naprawić sytuację. Rzecznik rządu powiedział: „Z punktu widzenia zdrowia publicznego i wymiaru sprawiedliwości istotne jest, aby ustawa jak najszybciej weszła w życie”. Minister zdrowia wyraził zaniepokojenie zdrowiem osób zażywających tymczasowo legalnych substancji, o których mowa, oraz wyrokami skazującymi za narkotyki wydanymi po wejściu w życie niekonstytucyjnych zmian.
mt: The Irish government has stressed the need for legislation to rectify the situation. A government spokesman said: "From a public health and justice perspective it is important that the legislation is brought into effect as soon as possible." The health minister expressed concern about the health of people using the temporary legal substances referred to, and the convictions for drugs handed down after the entry into force of the unconstitutional changes.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, rzecznik Wydziału Policji z Los Angeles, powiedział, że podejrzany o złamanie prawa mężczyzna jest przesłuchiwany raczej w sprawie wtargnięcia niż wandalizmu. Nie doszło do fizycznego uszkodzenia znaku; modyfikacji dokonano z użyciem kawałków czarnego brezentu z ozdobami w formie znaków pokoju i serca w taki sposób, że litera „O” zmieniła się w małe „e”.
mt: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect in the vandalism case is being questioned more about trespassing than vandalism. There was no physical damage to the sign; the modification was done using pieces of black bunting with peace and heart symbols in such a way that the letter "O" was changed to a small "e".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno jest dobrze znanym, choć kontrowersyjnym nauczycielem języka angielskiego, który pracował w szkołach Modern Education i King's Glory oraz twierdził, że u szczytu kariery miał 9000 uczniów. Jego notatki zawierają słowa przez niektórych rodziców uznawane za obsceniczne i podobno nie stronił też od wulgaryzmów podczas lekcji. Nowoczesna Edukacja oskarżyła go o zamieszczanie dużych reklam na autobusach bez żadnego pozwolenia oraz o kłamstwa na temat tego, że jest głównym nauczycielem angielskiego. Wcześniej został także oskarżony o naruszenie praw autorskich, lecz nie postawiono mu zarzutów. Były uczeń powiedział, że „mówił slangiem na zajęciach, uczył umiejętności randkowania i był jak kolega uczniów”.
mt: Karno is a well-known, though controversial English teacher who worked at Modern Education and King's Glory schools and claimed to have had 9000 students at the height of his career. His notes contained words deemed obscene by some parents and he was also not shy about using profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of posting large ads on buses without permission and of lying about being the main English teacher. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but no charges were brought. A former student said he “spoke slang in class, taught dating skills and was like a friend to students”.
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Autobus z turystami z Hongkongu został porwany w Manili, stolicy Filipin, przez byłego filipińskiego policjanta, który wziął pasażerów jako zakładników. Rolando Mendoza skierował ogień z karabinu M16 w stronę turystów. Do tej pory ocalono kilkoro zakładników, a co najmniej sześcioro zostało uznanych za zmarłych. Filipińscy fotografowie oraz sześciu zakładników, w tym dzieci i seniorzy, zostali uwolnieni wcześniej. Później fotografowie zajęli miejsce staruszki, potrzebującej toalety. Mendoza został zastrzelony.
mt: A bus of tourists from Hong Kong was hijacked in Manila, the capital of the Philippines, by a former Filipino policeman who took the passengers as hostages. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. So far, several hostages have been rescued, and at least six have been declared dead. Filipino photographers and six hostages, including children and seniors, were released earlier. Later, the photographers took the place of the elderly woman, who needed the toilet. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazylia to największy kraj rzymskokatolicki na Ziemi, a Kościół rzymskokatolicki w kraju cały czas sprzeciwia się małżeństwom osób tej samej płci. Kongres Narodowy Brazylii od 10 lat debatuje nad tą legalizacją i aktualnie śluby cywilne są dopuszczone prawnie jedynie w Rio Grande do Sul. Oryginalny projekt ustawy przygotowała Marta Suplicy, była burmistrz São Paulo. Proponowana regulacja z wprowadzonymi zmianami jest teraz w rękach Roberto Jeffersona. Protestujący liczą na to, że uda im się zebrać 1,2 miliona podpisów pod petycją, aby móc złożyć ją do Kongresu Narodowego w listopadzie.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country on Earth, and the Catholic Church in the country has always opposed same-sex marriage. The National Congress of Brazil has been debating this legalization for 10 years, and civil unions are only legally allowed in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was prepared by Marta Suplicy, former mayor of São Paulo. The proposed regulation with the added changes is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures on a petition to be able to submit it to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

The original bill was prepared by Marta Suplicy, former mayor of São Paulo. The proposed regulation with the added changes is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures on a petition to be able to submit it to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Pięć minut po rozpoczęciu pokazu zrywa się wiatr, minutę później wieje już z prędkością 70 km/h, zaczyna padać silny, zacinający deszcz, ostry jak igły w zetknięciu ze skórą, a za chwilę z nieba sypie się grad, ludzie panikują, wrzeszczą i uciekają, przewracając się nawzajem. „Zgubiłem siostrę i jej koleżankę, a po drodze minąłem dwie niepełnosprawne osoby na wózkach, które przeskakiwali i popychali ludzie” – powiedział Armand Versace.
mt: 5 minutes after the show started, the wind picked up, a minute later it was blowing at 70 km/h, heavy rain started to fall, stinging like needles on skin, and soon hail was falling from the sky, people panicked, screamed and ran, tripping over each other. "I lost my sister and her friend, and on the way I passed two disabled people on wheelchairs, who were jumping over and pushing people" - said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Meteorolodzy twierdzą, że burza, będąca w odległości około 645 mil (1040 km) na zachód od Wysp Zielonego Przylądka, powinna ucichnąć, zanim dotrze do jakiegoś obszaru lądowego. Fred wieje obecnie z prędkością 105 mil na godzinę (165 km/godz.) i przemieszcza się w kierunku południowo-zachodnim. Fred to najsilniejszy orkan kiedykolwiek zarejestrowany tak daleko na południu i wschodzie Atlantyku od wprowadzenia zdjęć satelitarnych i trzeci co do wielkości huragan zarejestrowany na wschód od 35° W.
mt: Meteorologists say the storm, about 645 miles (1040 km) west of Cape Verde, should die down before reaching any land area. Fred is currently blowing at 105 mph (165 km/h) and moving south-west. Fred is the strongest storm ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic and the third largest hurricane ever recorded east of 35° W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Norma 802.11n funkcjonuje na obu częstotliwościach: 2,4 Ghz i 5,0 Ghz. W ten sposób uzyska to wsteczną kompatybilność z 802.11a, 802.11b i 802.11g, zakładając że stacja bazowa ma podwójne radia. Prędkości standardu 802.11n są o wiele wyższe niż w poprzednich wersjach standardu, a poziom maksymalnej teoretycznej przepustowości wynosi 600 Mb/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on both frequencies: 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz. This way it will be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, assuming the base station has dual radios. The speeds of the 802.11n standard are much higher than in previous versions of the standard, with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mb/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Złoty medalista olimpijski miał wystartować na 100 m i 200 m stylem dowolnym oraz w trzech sztafetach podczas Igrzysk Wspólnoty Narodów, ale ponieważ narzekał na swoją formę, pojawiły się wątpliwości co do jego spodziewanych wyników. Leki konieczne do zwalczenia bólu były zakazane regulaminem igrzysk, więc nie mógł ich zażywać.
mt: 2004 Olympic gold medalist was to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but because he was complaining about his form, there were doubts about his expected results. The necessary painkillers were banned by the games regulations, so he could not take them.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Międzynarodowa mapa trzęsień ziemi amerykańskiej agencji naukowo-badawczej USGS nie odnotowała w ubiegłym tygodniu żadnych trzęsień ziemi na Islandii. Biuro Meteorologiczne z Islandii doniosło, że w ostatnich 48 godzinach nie było żadnych trzęsień ziemi w regionie Hekla. Istotna aktywność sejsmiczna skutkująca zmiany fazy została odnotowana 10 marca po północno-wschodniej stronie najwyższej kaldery wulkanu. U podnóża góry zaobserwowano ciemne chmury, które nie wynikają z żadnej aktywności wulkanicznej. Chmury mogły utrudnić rozpoznanie, czy faktycznie doszło do erupcji.
mt: The USGS earthquake map did not record any earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reported that there were no earthquakes in the Hekla region in the last 48 hours. Significant seismic activity resulting in a change of phase was recorded on March 10 after the northeast side of the highest crater of the volcano. Dark clouds were observed at the foot of the mountain, which were not due to any volcanic activity. The clouds may have hindered the recognition of whether there was actually an eruption.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Z pokładu bezosobowej sondy kosmicznej Chandrayaan-1 został uwolniony impaktor Moon Impact Probe (MIP), który przeleciał nad powierzchnią Księżyca z prędkością 1,5 kilometra na sekundę (4828 kilometrów na godzinę) i uderzył w jego powierzchnię w okolicy bieguna południowego. Sonda księżycowa miała na pokładzie trzy istotne przyrządy naukowe, a na jej wszystkich bokach namalowano flagę Indii.
mt: From the uncrewed Chandrayaan-1 spacecraft was released the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which flew over the lunar surface at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (4828 kilometers per hour) and hit its surface near the southern pole. The lunar probe had three important scientific instruments on board, and on all its sides was painted the flag of India.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: W tym sezonie pierwsze przypadki choroby zgłoszono pod koniec lipca. Nosicielami choroby są świnie, a następnie komary przenoszą ją na ludzi. Ognisko choroby wymusiło na rządzie indyjskim takie środki jak wysłanie ludzi w celu schwytania świń w najbardziej zagrożonych obszarach, dystrybucja tysięcy moskitier i rozpylanie pestycydów. Rząd obiecał także kilka milionów fiolek szczepionki przeciw zapaleniu mózgu, które pomogą przygotować placówki opieki zdrowotnej na przyszły rok. Plany dostawy szczepionek do obszarów, gdzie jak dotąd sytuacja była najtrudniejsza, uległy opóźnieniu wskutek braku funduszy i niskiego priorytetu w zestawieniu z innymi chorobami.
mt: 2017 cases were first reported at the end of July. The disease is carried by pigs, and then mosquitoes carry it to humans. The outbreak forced the Indian government to send people to catch pigs in the most affected areas, distribute thousands of mosquito nets and spray pesticides. The government also promised several million doses of vaccine against encephalitis, which will help prepare health facilities for next year. Plans to deliver vaccines to areas where the situation was most difficult were delayed due to lack of funds and low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Proponowana poprawka przeszła przez obie izby już w 2011 roku. W czasie tej sesji legislacyjnej wprowadzono zmianę – drugie zdanie zostało najpierw wykreślone przez Izbę Reprezentantów, a potem w poniedziałek przyjęte w podobnej formie przez Senat. Nieskuteczność drugiego zapisu, który proponuje zakaz związków jednopłciowych, może otworzyć drogę dla zalegalizowania związków partnerskich w przyszłości. Następnie rezolucja HJR-3 zostanie ponownie rozpatrzona przez kolejny wybrany organ ustawodawczy w 2015 lub 2016 roku w ramach dalszego procedowania.
mt: 2011, the proposed amendment passed both houses. During this legislative session, the second sentence was first struck down by the House of Representatives, and then on Monday adopted in a similar form by the Senate. The ineffectiveness of the second provision, which proposes a ban on same-sex unions, may open the way for the legalization of civil unions in the future. The resolution HJR-3 will be reconsidered by the next elected legislative body in 2015 or 2016 as part of further proceedings.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: „Kwity z Panamy” to globalny termin opisujący około dziesięć milionów dokumentów z panamskiej firmy prawniczej Mossack Fonesca, które wyciekły do gazet wiosną 2016 roku. Dokumenty pokazały, że czternaście banków pomogło zamożnym klientom w zatajeniu miliardów dolarów w celu uniknięcia podatków i obejścia innych regulacji. Brytyjska gazeta The Guardian zasugerowała, że Deutsche Bank kontrolował około jednej trzeciej z 1200 spółek fasadowych, które wykorzystano do osiągnięcia tego celu. Na całym świecie doszło do protestów, kilku postępowań karnych, a obaj przywódcy rządów Islandii i Pakistanu zrezygnowali.
mt: 2016 Panama Papers is a global term describing about ten million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonesca, which leaked to newspapers in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients to hide billions of dollars to avoid taxes and circumvent other regulations. The British newspaper The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled about one third of the 1200 shell companies that were used to achieve this goal. Protests took place around the world, several criminal proceedings, and both leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Iran posiada starzejącą się i słabo utrzymaną flotę, zarówno dla operacji cywilnych, jak i wojskowych, przez co często dochodzi tam do katastrof lotniczych. Wskutek sankcji międzynarodowych nie można dokonać zakupu nowych samolotów. Na początku tygodnia w katastrofie policyjnego helikoptera śmierć poniosły trzy osoby, a trzy kolejne odniosły obrażenia. W ubiegłym miesiącu doszło do największej od lat katastrofy irańskich linii lotniczych: rozbił się samolot w drodze do Armenii, a liczba ofiar śmiertelnych wyniosła 168. W tym samym miesiącu inny samolot pasażerski wyjechał poza pas startowy w Meszhedzie i zderzył się ze ścianą, w wyniku czego siedemnaście osób poniosło śmierć.
mt: Iran has an aging and poorly maintained fleet, both for civilian and military operations, so often there are air crashes there. Due to international sanctions, it is not possible to purchase new aircraft. At the beginning of the week, three people died in a police helicopter crash, and three others were injured. Last month, the largest air crash in years of Iranian airlines occurred: a plane crashed on its way to Armenia, with 168 fatalities. In the same month, another passenger plane drove off the runway in Meshed and collided with a wall, resulting in seventeen deaths.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Iran posiada starzejącą się i słabo utrzymaną flotę, zarówno dla operacji cywilnych, jak i wojskowych, przez co często dochodzi tam do katastrof lotniczych. Wskutek sankcji międzynarodowych nie można dokonać zakupu nowych samolotów. Na początku tygodnia w katastrofie policyjnego helikoptera śmierć poniosły trzy osoby, a trzy kolejne odniosły obrażenia. W ubiegłym miesiącu doszło do największej od lat katastrofy irańskich linii lotniczych: rozbił się samolot w drodze do Armenii, a liczba ofiar śmiertelnych wyniosła 168. W tym samym miesiącu inny samolot pasażerski wyjechał poza pas startowy w Meszhedzie i zderzył się ze ścianą, w wyniku czego siedemnaście osób poniosło śmierć.
mt: Iran has an aging and poorly maintained fleet, both for civilian and military operations, so often there are air crashes there. Due to international sanctions, it is not possible to purchase new aircraft. At the beginning of the week, three people died in a police helicopter crash, and three others were injured. Last month, the largest air crash in years of Iranian airlines occurred: a plane crashed on its way to Armenia, with 168 fatalities. In the same month, another passenger plane drove off the runway in Meshed and collided with a wall, resulting in seventeen deaths.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Iracka Grupa Studyjna zaprezentowała dzisiaj o godz. 12:00 GMT swój raport. Ostrzega, że nikt nie jest w stanie dać gwarancji, iż jakiekolwiek podjęte w tym momencie działania Iraku położą kres wojnie na tle religijnym, rosnącej przemocy bądź zagrożeniu chaosem. Raport rozpoczyna się apelem o otwartą debatę i konsensus w kwestii polityki Stanów Zjednoczonych w stosunku do Bliskiego Wschodu. Raport jest niezwykle krytyczny wobec prawie każdego aspektu obecnej polityki władzy wykonawczej wobec Iraku i nawołuje do natychmiastowej zmiany kierunku. Pierwszą z 78 rekomendacji jest podjęcie nowej dyplomatycznej inicjatywy przed końcem roku, aby zabezpieczyć granice Iraku przed wrogą interwencją i odnowić kontakty dyplomatyczne z sąsiadami.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi Study Group presented its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that any action taken by Iraq in this moment will put an end to the religious war, growing violence or threat of chaos. The report begins with an appeal for an open debate and consensus on the United States policy towards the Middle East. The report is extremely critical of almost every aspect of the executive branch's current policy towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction. The first of 78 recommendations is to take a new diplomatic initiative before the end of the year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile intervention and to renew diplomatic contacts with neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ansa poinformowała, że „obawy policji wzbudza kilka udanych zamachów na najwyższym szczeblu, co może doprowadzić do wybuchu wojny o sukcesję. Według policji Lo Piccolo miał przewagę, ponieważ był prawą ręką Provenzano w Palermo, a dzięki swemu większemu doświadczeniu cieszył się poważaniem starszego pokolenia bossów, którzy realizowali politykę Provenzano, polegającą na pozostawaniu w jak największym cieniu przy jednoczesnym wzmacnianiu potęgi swojej sieci. Provenzano kontrolował tych bossów, kiedy zakończył prowadzoną przez Riinę wojnę przeciwko krajowi, która kosztowała życie mafijnych bojowników Giovanniego Falcone i Paolo Borsellino w 1992 roku”.
mt: Ansa reported that "police fears are growing over a series of successful attacks at the highest level, which may lead to a war of succession. According to police, Lo Piccolo had the advantage because he was Provenzano's right hand in Palermo, and thanks to his greater experience enjoyed the respect of the older generation of bosses, who were implementing Provenzano's policy of remaining in the shadows while strengthening the power of his network. Provenzano controlled these bosses when he ended the war waged by Riina against the country, which cost the lives of mafia fighters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japoński judoka Hitoshi Saito, zdobywca dwóch złotych medali olimpijskich, zakończył życie w wieku 54 lat. Przyczyną śmierci był rak wewnątrzwątrobowych dróg żółciowych. Zmarł we wtorek w Osace. W chwili śmierci Saito był nie tylko byłym mistrzem olimpijskim i mistrzem świata, ale także przewodniczącym komitetu szkoleniowego Japońskiej Federacji Judo.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, who won two Olympic gold medals, died of bile duct cancer. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. At the time of his death, Saito was not only a former Olympic and world champion, but also chairman of the training committee of the Japanese Judo Federation.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: W trakcie swej wyprawy Iwasaki raz po raz wpadał w tarapaty. Obrabowali go piraci, w Tybecie zaatakował go wściekły pies, zdołał uniknąć małżeństwa w Nepalu, a w Indiach został aresztowany.
mt: During his travels Iwasaki was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, avoided marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella utracił panowanie nad pojazdem i wyścig skończył się dla niego niemal tuż za linią startu. Jego kolega z zespołu, Fernando Alonso, był liderem przez większość wyścigu, ale zakończył go tuż po pit-stopie, przypuszczalnie na skutek nieprawidłowego dokręcenia prawego koła z przodu. Michael Schumacher skończył wyścig chwilę po Alonso z powodu uszkodzeń zawieszenia odniesionych podczas licznych potyczek w trakcie wyścigu.
mt: 2005 Formula One World Champion Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and the race ended for him almost immediately after the start line. His teammate, Fernando Alonso, was the leader for most of the race, but ended it shortly after the pit stop, possibly due to a misaligned right front wheel. Michael Schumacher finished the race a few seconds after Alonso due to suspension damage sustained during numerous collisions during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: W ciągu ostatnich trzech miesięcy z aresztu zwolniono ponad 80 aresztowanych, bez postawienia im formalnych zarzutów. W kwietniu bieżącego roku został wydany nakaz tymczasowego zatrzymania w obiekcie, aby zrealizować zwolnienie osób przetrzymywanych ponad 24 godziny od ujęcia, które nie zostały przesłuchane przez komisarza sądowego. Komisarz ustanawia kaucję, jeśli zostanie przyznana i formalizuje zarzuty postawione przez funkcjonariusza dokonującego zatrzymania. Zarzuty są potem wprowadzane do stanowego systemu komputerowego, w którym sprawa jest monitorowana. Data rozprawy wskazuje także termin wykonania przysługującego podejrzanemu prawa do szybkiego procesu.
mt: 80 arrested in the last three months have been released from jail without formal charges. In April of this year, a temporary restraining order was issued to carry out the release of people held for more than 24 hours after arrest, who have not been interviewed by the court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail if it is granted and formalizes the charges brought by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state computer system, where the case is monitored. The date of the hearing also indicates the term of the defendant's right to speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin powiedział też, że decydenci postanowili odwołać drugą turę w celu ochronienia Afgańczyków przed kosztami i zagrożeniami łączącymi się z bezpieczeństwem kolejnych wyborów. Dyplomaci orzekli, że afgańska konstytucja zawiera na tyle dużo niejednoznacznych zapisów, by uznać drugą turę za niekonieczną. To stoi w sprzeczności z wcześniejszymi doniesieniami, według których odwołanie drugiej tury byłoby niezgodne z konstytucją.
mt: Lodin also said that the decision-makers decided to cancel the second round in order to protect Afghans from the costs and risks associated with the safety of further elections. Diplomats ruled that the Afghan constitution contains so many ambiguous provisions that the second round is not necessary. This is in contrast to earlier reports, according to which the cancellation of the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Od chwili uzyskania niepodległości Pakistanu od rządów brytyjskich w 1947 roku prezydent Pakistanu wyznacza „agentów politycznych” do zarządzania FATA i sprawowania prawie całkowitej autonomicznej kontroli nad tymi terenami. Ci agenci mają za zadanie świadczyć usługi rządowe i sądownicze na podstawie Artykułu 247 Konstytucji Pakistanu.
mt: Since the independence of Pakistan from British rule in 1947, the President of Pakistan has appointed “political agents” to administer FATA and exercise almost complete autonomous control over these territories. These agents are tasked with providing government and judicial services based on Article 247 of the Constitution of Pakistan.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

Ci agenci mają za zadanie świadczyć usługi rządowe i sądownicze na podstawie Artykułu 247 Konstytucji Pakistanu.
