src: Film, w którym występowali Ryan Gosling i Emma Stone dostał nominacje we wszystkich głównych kategoriach. Nominacje do nagrody dla najlepszego aktora i najlepszej aktorki otrzymali Gosling i Stone. Pozostałe nominacje to: najlepszy film, reżyser, zdjęcia, kostiumy, montaż, muzyka filmowa, scenografia, udźwiękowienie i scenariusz oryginalny. Dwie piosenki z filmu, a mianowicie „Audition” („The Fools Who Dream”) i „City of Stars”, otrzymały nominacje do nagrody za najlepszą piosenkę oryginalną. Studio Lionsgate otrzymało 26 nominacji, wyprzedzając tym samym wszystkich konkurentów.
mt: 2016 Academy Awards Nominations
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK doniosło też, iż elektrownia atomowa Kashiwazaki Kariwa w prefekturze Niigata działa tak jak zwykle. Firma Hokuriku Electric Power nie zgłosiła jakichkolwiek negatywnych skutków trzęsienia ziemi, ani wyłączenia reaktorów nr 1 i 2 w jej elektrowni atomowej. Według relacji około 9400 domów w tym regionie nie ma wody, a około 100 prądu. Na dotkniętym obszarze zostały zniszczone niektóre drogi a transport kolejowy wstrzymany. Zamknięto również lotnisko Noto w prefekturze Ishikawa.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture is operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company has not reported any negative effects of the earthquake, nor the shutdown of reactors 1 and 2 at its nuclear power plant. According to reports, about 9,400 homes in this region are without water, and about 100 without power. Some roads in the affected area have been damaged and rail transport has been halted. The Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture has also been closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

Według relacji około 9400 domów w tym regionie nie ma wody, a około 100 prądu. Na dotkniętym obszarze zostały zniszczone niektóre drogi a transport kolejowy wstrzymany. Zamknięto również lotnisko Noto w prefekturze Ishikawa.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture is operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company has not reported any negative effects of the earthquake, nor the shutdown of reactors 1 and 2 at its nuclear power plant. According to reports, about 9,400 homes in this region are without water, and about 100 without power. Some roads in the affected area have been damaged and rail transport has been halted. The Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture has also been closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Według przecieku dokument będzie dotyczył spornych granic, które Palestyna chce przywrócić do stanu sprzed wojny sześciodniowej Według przecieku dokument będzie dotyczył spornych granic, które Palestyna chce przywrócić do stanu sprzed Wojny sześciodniowej w 1967 roku. Według doniesień inne poruszane tematy dotyczą przyszłego statusu Jerozolimy, świętego miasta dla obu narodów, a także kwestii Doliny Jordanu. Izrael domaga się trwałej obecności militarnej w dolinie przez dziesięć lat po podpisaniu porozumienia, a AP wyraża zgodę na taką obecność tylko na pięć lat.
mt: According to a leak, the document will concern disputed borders, which the Palestinians want to restore to the state before the Six-Day War. According to a leak, the document will concern disputed borders, which the Palestinians want to restore to the state before the Six-Day War in 1967. According to reports, other topics include the future status of Jerusalem, a holy city for both nations, as well as the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, and AP agrees to such a presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Pochodzący z Hongkongu Ma studiował na Uniwersytecie Nowojorskim i na wydziale prawa Uniwersytetu Harvarda, a kiedyś posiadał amerykańską ""zieloną kartę."" Podczas wyborów Hsieh zasugerował, że podczas kryzysu MA może czmychnąć z kraju. Hsieh przekonywał również, że fotogeniczny Ma ucieleśnia przerost formy nad treścią. Na przekór tym zarzutom Ma wygrał z łatwością dzięki postulatowi bliższych więzi z Chinami kontynentalnymi."
mt: "Ma, who is from Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School, and once held an American "green card." During the election, Hsieh suggested that Ma might flee the country during a crisis. Hsieh also argued that Ma's photogenic image embodied form over substance. In spite of these criticisms, Ma won easily on the strength of his pro-China platform."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Gdy okazało się, że wiele rodzin szuka pomocy prawnej, by sprzeciwić się eksmisjom, 20 marca zorganizowano dla ofiar oszustwa mieszkaniowego spotkanie w lokalnym centrum prawniczym East Bay Community Law Centre. Gdy lokatorzy zaczęli rozmawiać ze sobą o tym, co się stało, większość rodzin nagle uświadomiła sobie, że Carolyn Wilson z urzędu OHA przywłaszczyła sobie ich kaucje i uciekła z miasta. Lokatorzy Lockwood Gardens sądzą, że na eksmisję może być narażonych 40 albo więcej kolejnych rodzin, od kiedy dotarła do nich informacja, że policja OHA prowadzi dochodzenie w sprawie innych publicznych mieszkań w Oakland, gdzie również mogło dojść do oszustwa.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for victims of housing fraud. When tenants started talking to each other about what happened, most of the families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had stolen their deposits and fled the city. Lockwood Gardens tenants believe that up to 40 or more additional families may be at risk since they learned that the Oakland Police Department is investigating other public housing in Oakland where fraud may have occurred.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Po rajdzie Keselowski, który ma 2250 punktów, pozostaje liderem w klasyfikacji kierowców. Johnson ma siedem punktów straty i zajmuje drugie miejsce z wynikiem 2243. Na trzecim miejscu plasuje się Hamlin z dwudziestoma punktami straty i wyprzedzając Bowyera o pięć punktów. Kahne i Truex Jr. zajmują odpowiednio piątą (2220 punktów) i szóstą pozycję (2207 punktów). W mistrzostwach kierowców cztery ostatnie miejsca w pierwszej dziesiątce zajmują Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth i Harvick, a do zakończenia sezonu pozostały jeszcze cztery wyścigi.
mt: 2010 NASCAR Sprint Cup Series points standings after the 2010 Ford 400 at Homestead-Miami Speedway:
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Podobno to jest piąty przypadek w historii, gdy ludzie zaobserwowali spadający na ziemię materiał, potwierdzony chemicznie jako marsjański. Na Ziemię spadło około 24 000 meteorytów, o których wiemy, a tylko około 34 z nich ma potwierdzone pochodzenie marsjańskie. Piętnaście z tych skał spadło z deszczem meteorytów w lipcu ubiegłego roku. Niektóre skały, bardzo rzadkie na Ziemi, osiągają ceny od 11 000 do 22 500 dolarów za uncję, czyli mniej więcej dziesięciokrotnie więcej niż kosztuje złoto.
mt: 24,000 meteorites are known to have fallen on Earth, and only about 34 of them have been confirmed to be Martian. Fifteen of those rocks fell during the meteor shower in July last year. Some rocks, very rare on Earth, cost between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, about ten times more than gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, który zakończył karierę w 2006 roku z siedmioma tytułami mistrza Formuły 1, miał zastąpić Felipego Massę, który doznał kontuzji. Brazylijczyk odniósł poważną kontuzję głowy w wyniku wypadku podczas Grand Prix Węgier w 2009 roku. Massa nie będzie dostępny co najmniej do końca sezonu 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired in 2006 with seven titles, was to replace Felipe Massa, who suffered an injury. The Brazilian sustained a serious head injury in a crash during the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa will not be available at least until the end of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Dotychczas firmie AOL udawało się rozwijać rynek komunikatorów internetowych we własnym tempie ze względu na wszechobecność jej usług w Stanach Zjednoczonych. W takiej sytuacji ta swoboda może się zakończyć. Łączna liczba użytkowników Yahoo! i usług Microsoftu będzie konkurować z liczbą klientów AOL.
mt: AOL has been able to develop the instant messaging market at its own pace due to its ubiquity in the United States. In such a situation, this freedom may end. The combined number of Yahoo! and Microsoft users will compete with AOL's clients.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Bomba zamontowana w samochodzie została zdetonowana wczoraj rano na terenie komendy głównej policji w Gaziantep, w Turcji, uśmiercając dwóch funkcjonariuszy i raniąc ponad dwadzieścia osób. Zgodnie z oświadczeniem biura gubernatora wśród rannych było dziewiętnastu policjantów. Policja mówi, że podejrzewają o atak przypuszczalnego wojownika Daesh (ISIL).
mt: A bomb placed in a car was detonated yesterday morning at the headquarters of the police in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two officers and injuring over twenty people. According to a statement by the governor's office, nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police say they suspect a Daesh (ISIL) fighter of the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: We wtorek Mitt Romney, były gubernator stanu Massachusetts, wygrał prawybory prezydenckie Partii Republikańskiej na Florydzie z wynikiem 46%. Drugie miejsce z wynikiem 32% zajął Newt Gingrich, były Spiker Izby Reprezentantów Stanów Zjednoczonych. Floryda to stan, w którym zwycięzca bierze wszystko, w związku z tym wszystkie 50 głosów delegatów przyznano Romneyowi, dzięki czemu wysunął się na czoło wyścigu o nominację Partii Republikańskiej.
mt: On Tuesday, former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary with 46% of the vote. Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, came in second with 32%. Florida is a winner-take-all state, so all 50 delegates were awarded to Romney, putting him in the lead in the race for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Newt Gingrich, były Speaker w Izbie Reprezentantów, Rick Perry, gubernator Teksasu, i kongresmenka Michele Bachmann zajęli odpowiednio czwarte, piąte i szóste miejsce. Po uzyskaniu wyników Gingrich wychwalał Santorum i krytykował Romneya z powodu jego negatywnych spotów reklamowych nadawanych w Iowa. Perry oznajmił, że „wróci do Teksasu, by ocenić wyniki wewnątrzpartyjnych nominacji z dzisiejszego wieczoru i sprawdzić, czy ma szanse w tym wyścigu”, ale później dodał, że nie ustąpi i weźmie udział w prawyborach w Południowej Karolinie 21 stycznia. Bachmann, która zwyciężyła w sondażu orientacyjnym (Ames Straw Poll) w sierpniu, zdecydowała, że kończy kampanię.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, Rick Perry, Governor of Texas, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann took fourth, fifth and sixth place respectively. After the results Gingrich praised Santorum and criticized Romney for his negative television ads in Iowa. Perry said he would “return to Texas to assess the results of tonight’s intraparty nomination and see if he has a chance in this race,” but later added that he would not drop out and would participate in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Witryna stacji określa program jako „staromodne słuchowisko teatralne w nowej, skandalicznie maniakalnej odsłonie!” Początkowo program był nadawany tylko w długo już działające radiowej rozgłośni internetowej TogiNet Radio, w której dominowały audycje w formie rozmów i telefonów od słuchaczy. W końcówce 2015 roku TogiNet założyło stację AstroNet Radio jako filię. W programie początkowo występowali amatorscy lektorzy, mieszkający lokalnie do wschodniego Teksasu.
mt: The station's website describes the program as "old-fashioned radio play in a new, scandalously maniacal version!"  The program was originally broadcast only on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which was dominated by talk shows and listener phone calls.  At the end of 2015, TogiNet established the AstroNet Radio station as a branch.  The program initially featured amateur announcers, living locally in East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Witryna stacji określa program jako „staromodne słuchowisko teatralne w nowej, skandalicznie maniakalnej odsłonie!” Początkowo program był nadawany tylko w długo już działające radiowej rozgłośni internetowej TogiNet Radio, w której dominowały audycje w formie rozmów i telefonów od słuchaczy. W końcówce 2015 roku TogiNet założyło stację AstroNet Radio jako filię. W programie początkowo występowali amatorscy lektorzy, mieszkający lokalnie do wschodniego Teksasu.
mt: The station's website describes the program as "old-fashioned radio play in a new, scandalously maniacal version!"  The program was originally broadcast only on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which was dominated by talk shows and listener phone calls.  At the end of 2015, TogiNet established the AstroNet Radio station as a branch.  The program initially featured amateur announcers, living locally in East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Napastnicy przybyli do Mumbaju łodzią 26 listopada 2008 roku, wyposażeni w granaty i broń automatyczną, po czym dokonali ataku na kilka celów, w tym na zatłoczoną stację kolejową Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus i słynny hotel Taj Mahal. Zwiady i informacje zgromadzone przez Davida Headleya umożliwiły przeprowadzenie operacji przez 10 uzbrojonych bandytów należących do Laskhar-e-Taiba, pakistańskiej grupy bojowników. Atak wywołał ogromne napięcie pomiędzy Indiami a Pakistanem.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived in Mumbai by boat, armed with grenades and automatic weapons, and attacked several targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. Intelligence and information gathered by David Headley enabled the operation to be carried out by 10 armed militants belonging to Lashkar-e-Taiba, a Pakistani militant group. The attack caused great tension between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Rekord Nadala w meczach z Kanadyjczykiem wynosi 7:2. Ostatnio uległ Raonicowi w Brisbane Open. Nadal zdobył 88% punktów przy siatce w całym meczu i wygrał pierwszy serwis z wynikiem 76 punktów. Po meczu król mączki powiedział: „Bardzo mnie cieszy, że mogę znów brać udział w finałach najważniejszych turniejów. Jestem tu po to, aby sięgnąć po zwycięstwo”.
mt: Nadal's record against Raonic is 7-2.  Nadal won 88% of points on serve in the entire match and won the first set 76. After the match, the king of clay said, "I'm very happy to be back in the finals of the biggest tournaments. I'm here to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: W ubiegłym tygodniu program Naked News wydał oświadczenie o zamiarze radykalnego rozszerzenia zakresu swoich nadawanych w kilku językach wiadomości o trzy nowe audycje. Światowa organizacja, która obecnie publikuje raporty w języku angielskim i japońskim, przygotowuje już programy po hiszpańsku, włosku i koreańsku dla telewizji, Internetu i na urządzenia mobilne.
mt: Last week, the Naked News program announced plans to radically expand the scope of its broadcasted news in three new languages. The worldwide organization, which currently publishes reports in English and Japanese, is already preparing programs in Spanish, Italian, and Korean for television, the Internet, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Oprócz środowej imprezy Carpanedo wziął udział w dwóch indywidualnych wyścigach na mistrzostwach. Pierwszą konkurencją był slalom, w którym nie ukończyła pierwszego biegu. Z takim samym wynikiem zakończyło wyścig 36 spośród 116 zawodników. Drugi wyścig (slalom gigant) ukończyła na dziesiątym miejscu w kategorii siedzącej kobiet z łącznym czasem 4:41:30, czyli o 2:11:60 wolniej niż zwyciężczyni, Austriaczka Claudia Loesch, i o 1:09:02 wolniej niż zajmująca dziewiąte miejsce Gyöngyi Dani z Węgier. Cztery narciarki w grupie zawodniczek siedzących nie ukończyły biegu, a 45 ze 117 narciarzy uczestniczących w slalomie gigancie nie zostało sklasyfikowanych.
mt: In addition to the Wednesday Carpanedo participated in two individual races at the championships. The first competition was a slalom, in which she did not finish the first run. With the same result ended the race 36 of 116 athletes. The second race (slalom giant) finished tenth in the sitting women's category with a total time of 4:41:30, or 2:11:60 slower than the winner, Austrian Claudia Loesch, and 1:09:02 slower than Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary, who finished ninth. Four of the 117 athletes participating in the slalom giant were not ranked, and 45 of the 117 athletes participating in the slalom giant were not ranked.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: W środę NBA (Narodowe Stowarzyszenie Koszykówki w USA) ogłosiło, że nowy sezon rozgrywek zostaje zawieszony ze względu na sytuację związaną z COVID-19. Postanowienie NBA wynikało z pozytywnego wyniku testu na obecność wirusa COVID-19 u zawodnika Utah Jazz.
mt: On Wednesday, the NBA (National Basketball Association in the USA) announced that the new season of the games is suspended due to the situation related to COVID-19. The NBA decision was due to a positive test result for the presence of the COVID-19 virus in a Utah Jazz player.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Dzisiaj graczem dnia został Alex Ovechkin z drużyny Washington Capitals. W wygranym 5:3 meczu Waszyngtonu z Atlanta Thrasher zdobył dwa gole i dwie asysty. Tego wieczoru pierwsza asysta Owieczkina była przy zwycięskim golu debiutanta Nicklasa Backstroma; Tego wieczoru jego drugi gol był jednocześnie jego 60. trafieniem w sezonie, co czyni go pierwszym graczem, który zdobył 60 lub więcej goli w ciągu jednego sezonu od 1995–96 roku, gdy Jaromir Jagr i Mario Lemieux ustanowili ten rekord ex aequo.
mt: Today's player of the day was Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. In the 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, he scored two goals and two assists. His first assist was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal was also his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux tied the record.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Nacjonalizacja banku Northern Rock nastąpiła w roku 2008 po upublicznieniu informacji, że spółka otrzymała kryzysową pomoc od rządu Wielkiej Brytanii. Bank Northern Rock wymagał pomocy, ponieważ dotknął go kryzys na rynku kredytów hipotecznych o wysokim ryzyku w roku 2007. Oferta złożona przez Virgin Group należącą do Sir Richarda Bransona została odrzucona przed nacjonalizacją banku. W roku 2010 w ramach nacjonalizacji obecny bank detaliczny Northern Rock plc oddzielił się od „skompromitowanego banku” Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin kupiła tylko „dobry bank” Northern Rock, bez spółki zarządzania aktywami.
mt: 2008 nationalisation of Northern Rock occurred after the bank was publicly revealed to have received a government bailout. Northern Rock required assistance because it was affected by the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. The offer made by Virgin Group, owned by Sir Richard Branson, was rejected before the nationalisation of the bank. In 2010, as part of the nationalisation, the current retail bank Northern Rock plc separated from the “compromised bank” Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the “good bank” Northern Rock, without the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Decyzja pana Rudda o przystąpieniu do porozumienia klimatycznego z Kioto oznacza izolację Stanów Zjednoczonych, które jako jedyny kraj rozwinięty nie ratyfikują porozumienia. Byłe konserwatywne władze Australii odrzuciły ratyfikację protokołu z Kioto, oznajmiając, że przyniosłoby to szkodę gospodarce z powodu dużego uzależnienia od eksportu węgla, podczas gdy takie kraje jak Indie czy Chiny nie były związane celami obejmującymi emisję.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to join the Kyoto climate change agreement means the United States, the only developed country not to ratify the agreement, is isolated. Former conservative Australian governments rejected ratification of the Kyoto protocol, saying it would harm the economy because of its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound by the emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Strzelcy uczestniczący w dodatkowym teście kontroli szkodników mieli być ściśle nadzorowani przez leśników, ponieważ test był monitorowany i podlegał ocenie skuteczności. W ramach partnerstwa NPWS i Australijskiego Sportowego Związku Strzeleckiego (NSW) rekrutowano wykwalifikowanych wolontariuszy w ramach programu łowieckiego Sportowego Związku Strzeleckiego. Mick O'Flynn, dyrektor ds. ochrony i dziedzictwa parku NPSW, uważa, że czterech strzelców wybranych do pierwszej operacji strzeleckiej dostało kompleksową instrukcję w zakresie bezpieczeństwa i szkolenia.
mt: Shooters participating in the additional pest control test were to be closely monitored by foresters, as the test was being monitored and subject to evaluation of effectiveness. As part of the NPWS and NSW Sporting Shooters Association partnership, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association pest control program. Mick O'Flynn, NPWS heritage and conservation director, believes four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Patrząc na tę skamielinę, to oznacza, że rozpad nastąpił o wiele wcześniej, niż zakładano na podstawie dowodów molekularnych. „To oznacza, że należy wszystko cofnąć w czasie” – powiedział Berhane Asfaw, badacz z instytutu Rift Valley Research Service w Etiopii i współautor badania.
mt: Looking at this fossil, it means that the breakup happened much earlier than previously thought based on molecular evidence. “It means that everything has to be pushed back in time,” said Berhane Asfaw, a researcher with the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

mt: Looking at this fossil, it means that the breakup happened much earlier than previously thought based on molecular evidence. “It means that everything has to be pushed back in time,” said Berhane Asfaw, a researcher with the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Podczas czwartkowej prezentacji najważniejszych punktów Tokyo Game Show prezes Nintendo, Satoru Iwata, zaprezentował projekt pada do nowej konsoli Nintendo Revolution. Kontroler przypomina pilot do telewizora i korzysta z dwóch czujników znajdujących się w pobliżu telewizora użytkownika w celu triangulacji położenia w przestrzeni 3D. Dzięki temu gracze będą mogli kontrolować akcje i ruchy w grach wideo, przesuwając urządzenie w powietrzu.
mt: During Thursday's presentation of the Tokyo Game Show's highlights, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of a new controller for the Nintendo Revolution. The controller resembles a TV remote and uses two sensors near the TV to triangulate its position in 3D space. This allows players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Informacja o porwaniu samolotu została uprzednio podana przez chińską agencję informacyjną Xinhua. Z późniejszych raportów wynikało, że do samolotu dotarła informacja o zagrożeniu bombowym, więc zawrócił do Afganistanu i zszedł do lądowania w Kandaharze. Pierwsze raporty stanowią, iż samolot został przekierowany z powrotem do Afganistanu, po odmowie na awaryjne lądowanie w Ürümqi.
mt: The information about the hijacking was first reported by the Chinese news agency Xinhua. Later reports indicated that the plane was informed of a bomb threat, so it turned back to Afghanistan and landed in Kandahar. Initial reports state that the plane was rerouted back to Afghanistan, after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: W poniedziałek Sara Denius, stała sekretarz Komitetu Noblowskiego ds. Literatury przy Szwedzkiej Akademii, w czasie programu radiowego w szwedzkim Sveriges Radio, podała publicznie informację, iż komisja zaprzestała już prób nawiązania bezpośredniego kontaktu z Bobem Dylanem w kwestii zdobycia przez niego Literackiej Nagrody Nobla w roku 2016. Danius powiedziała: „Teraz nic nie robimy. Zadzwoniłam do jego najbliższego współpracownika, wysłałam mu e-maile i otrzymałam bardzo miłe odpowiedzi. Na razie to z pewnością wystarczy”.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, revealed publicly during a radio program on Swedish Radio that the committee had ceased all attempts to directly contact Bob Dylan regarding his receiving the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2016. Danius said, "We're not doing anything now. I called his closest collaborator, I sent him emails, and I got very nice replies. That will probably be enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Amerykański prezydent George W. Bush wyraził zadowolenie w związku z tym oświadczeniem. Rzecznik Busha, Gordon Johndroe, określił przyrzeczenie Korei Północnej „wielkim krokiem w stronę wiarygodnej denuklearyzacji Półwyspu Koreańskiego”.
mt: American President George W. Bush expressed satisfaction with the statement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe described the North Korean pledge as "a big step toward credible denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: W 1956 r. Słania przeprowadził się do Szwecji, gdzie trzy lata później zaczął pracować w Poczcie Szwedzkiej i został jej naczelnym grawerem. Wytworzył przeszło 1000 znaczków dla Szwecji i 28 innych państw. Jakość i szczegółowość jego prac są tak uznawane, że jest jednym z niewielu powszechnie znanych nazwisk wśród filatelistów. Niektórzy kolekcjonują wyłącznie jego prace. Jego tysięcznym znaczkiem był wspaniały znaczek Davida Klockera z 2000 r. „Wielkie czyny szwedzkich królów”, wpisany do Księgi Rekordów Guinessa. Wykonywał również ryty banknotów dla wielu krajów, ostatnio portrety premierów na awersach nowych kanadyjskich banknotów 5- i 100-dolarowych.
mt: 1956 Slinia moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became its chief engraver. He created over 1000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. The quality and detail of his work are so highly regarded that he is one of the few names widely known among philatelists. Some collectors collect only his work. His thousandth stamp was the magnificent stamp of David Klockers from 2000 "Great deeds of Swedish kings", entered in the Guinness Book of Records. He also engraved banknotes for many countries, most recently portraits of prime ministers on the obverse of new Canadian 5- and 100-dollar bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Z powodu wylania się tysięcy baryłek ropy naftowej na południe od Fairbanks na Alasce zamknięto 800 mil ropociągu Trans-Alaska. Awaria zasilania po rutynowym teście systemu pożarowego doprowadziła do otwarcia zaworów nadmiarowych i wycieku ropy naftowej w pobliżu stacji pomp nr 9 w Fort Greely. Odkręcenie zaworów umożliwiło spuszczenie ciśnienia z układu, a ropa wypłynęła przez podkładkę do zbiornika mieszczącego 55 000 baryłek (2,3 miliona galonów). W środowe popołudnie odpowietrzniki kontenera wciąż przeciekały, prawdopodobnie z powodu rozszerzalności cieplnej w zbiorniku. Dodatkowa strefa bezpieczeństwa, znajdująca się poniżej zbiorników mieszczących 104 500 baryłek, nie została jeszcze wypełniona.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska pipeline was closed due to thousands of barrels of oil spilling south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A failure of the pressure relief system during a routine test opened the excess pressure valves and allowed oil to spill near pump station 9 in Fort Greely. Opening the valves allowed the pressure to drop in the system, and the oil spilled through the containment pad into a 55,000-barrel (2.3 million gallon) tank. By midday on Wednesday, the tank vents were still leaking, possibly due to thermal expansion in the tank. An additional safety zone, below the 104,500-barrel tanks, has not yet been filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Korpus Inżynieryjny Stanów Zjednoczonych ustalił, że jeśli spadnie jeszcze 6 cali deszczu, uszkodzone wcześniej wały przeciwpowodziowe mogą zostać zerwane. Dzielnica 9th Ward, gdzie woda sięgnęła poziomu 20 stóp podczas huraganu Katrina, jest teraz zalana po pas, ponieważ nie wytrzymał pobliski wał przeciwpowodziowy. Woda przelała się przez wał przeciwpowodziowy na odcinku szerokim na 100 stóp.
mt: 9th Ward, where water reached 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now flooded up to the curb, as a nearby levee broke. Water poured over the levee on a stretch 100 feet wide.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton potwierdził, że pacjent przyjęty do Szpitala Uniwersyteckiego Howarda był w stabilnym stanie. Pacjent przebywał w Nigerii, gdzie odnotowano kilka przypadków wirusa Ebola. Szpital postępował zgodnie z protokołem kontroli infekcji, izolując pacjenta, aby zapobiec potencjalnemu zarażeniu innych.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that a patient admitted to Howard University Hospital was in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where several cases of the Ebola virus had been reported. The hospital was following infection control protocol, isolating the patient to prevent potential infection of others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Zakłada się możliwość, że komety dostarczały na Ziemię wodę wraz z materią organiczną zdolną tworzyć białka i utrzymywać życie. Naukowcy liczą, że poznają proces powstawania planet, a szczególnie jak ten proces wyglądał w przypadku Ziemi, ponieważ dawno temu komety się z nią zderzyły.
mt: It is believed that comets brought water to Earth along with organic matter capable of forming proteins and maintaining life. Scientists hope to learn the process of planet formation, especially how this process looked like in the case of Earth, because long ago comets collided with it.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Władze nie wiedzą, czy groźba jest wiarygodna, ale pod naciskiem FBI zakład transportu w Maryland zamknął tunele. Użyto wywrotek do zablokowania wejść do metra, a 80 policjantów wezwanych do pomocy miało kierować kierowców na objazdy. Na obwodnicy, która jest alternatywą dla trasy wiodącej przez miasto, nie zgłoszono żadnych poważnych opóźnień w ruchu.
mt: Authorities don't know if the threat is credible, but under pressure from the FBI, a Maryland transportation hub closed tunnels.  Bollards were used to block entrances to the metro, and 80 police officers called in to help directed drivers to detours.  No major delays were reported on the beltway, which is an alternative to the route through the city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Fotografa przewieziono do Centrum Medycznego UCLA im. Ronalda Reagana, gdzie wkrótce nastąpił zgon. Podobno miał dwadzieścia kilka lat. W oświadczeniu Bieber oznajmił: „Chociaż nie brałem bezpośredniego udziału w tym tragicznym wypadku, moje myśli i modlitwy są z rodziną ofiary”. Według strony TMZ z rozrywkowymi aktualnościami fotograf zatrzymał swój pojazd po drugiej stronie bulwaru Sepulveda i próbował fotografować policyjne zatrzymanie, potem przeszedł przez ulicę, by kontynuować – przez co funkcjonariusz Kalifornijskiego Patrolu Autostradowego postanowił wstrzymać ruch, aby nakazać mu powrót, i to dwukrotnie. Policja twierdzi, że kierowca pojazdu, który potrącił fotografa, raczej nie usłyszy zarzutów.
mt: The photographer was transported to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly in his twenties. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I did not personally witness the accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim of this tragic car crash." According to TMZ, the photographer stopped his vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop, then crossed the street to continue – prompting a California Highway Patrol officer to stop traffic to order him back, twice. Police say the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will likely not be charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Prezydencki minister Rodrigo Arias oświadczył, że prezydent Arias ma dodatni wynik testu potwierdzający łagodny przypadek wirusa. Stan prezydenta jest stabilny, ale jeszcze przez kilka dni będzie przebywać na izolacji w domu. Oprócz gorączki oraz bólu gardła czuję się na tyle dobrze, by móc wykonywać moją pracę w formie zdalnej. Arias oświadczył, „że w poniedziałek spodziewa się wrócić do sprawowania wszystkich swoich obowiązków”.
mt: Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias announced that President Arias has a positive test result confirming a mild case of the virus. The president's condition is stable, but he will be quarantined at home for a few more days. In addition to fever and sore throat, I feel well enough to perform my work remotely. Arias said, "I expect to return to all my duties on Monday."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Cyklon tropikalny Gonu, w języku Malediwów nazywany od worka liści palmowych, w swoim szczytowym momencie osiągał prędkość wiatru wynoszącą 240 kilometrów na godzinę (149 mil na godzinę). Dzisiaj o wcześniejszej porze wiatr wiał z prędkością 83 km/godz. i oczekiwano, że będzie słabł.
mt: Tropical Cyclone Gonu, known in the Maldives as the coconut leaf basket, reached its peak with winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour) at its peak. Today, the wind was blowing at 83 km/h and was expected to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Przyczyną czerwonego przypływu jest wyższe niż normalnie stężenie Karenia brevis, występującego w naturze jednokomórkowego organizmu morskiego. Czynniki naturalne mogą tworzyć kombinację, w której powstają idealne warunki do diametralnego wzrostu nagromadzenia alg. Neurotoksyna wytwarzana przez algi może sparaliżować nerwy zarówno u ludzi, jak i u ryb. Ryby często giną w efekcie wysokiej koncentracji toksyn w wodach. Ludzie mogą zostać poszkodowani z powodu wdychania zainfekowanej wody, przenoszonej w powietrzu poprzez wiatr i fale.
mt: The red tide is caused by higher than normal concentrations of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can create a combination that creates ideal conditions for a dramatic increase in the algae bloom. Neurotoxin produced by the algae can paralyze the nerves of both humans and fish. Fish often die as a result of high concentrations of toxins in the water. People can be affected by inhaling infected water, carried through the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia była kiedyś klasyfikowana w Kategorii 4 na skali Saffira-Simpsona określającej intensywność huraganu, ale spadła do kategorii depresji tropikalnej, a we wtorek całkowicie zanikła. W ślad za minionym huraganem spadły ulewne deszcze na terenie większości wysp, ale jak dotąd nie ma żadnych doniesień o szkodach bądź zalaniach. Opady atmosferyczne, sięgające 6,34 cala na deszczomierzu w Oahu, określono jako „zbawienne”. Wraz z opadami deszczu wystąpiły burze z piorunami i częstymi błyskawicami.
mt: Felicia was once classified as a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson scale, but dropped to tropical depression status and dissipated on Monday. Heavy rains fell on most of the islands in the wake of the storm, but there have been no reports of damage or flooding. Rainfall totals of 6.34 inches on Oahu were described as "blessed." Thunderstorms with lightning and frequent lightning accompanied the rain.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Na Grand Prix Singapuru w 200 roku Piquet Jr. zaliczył kraksę tuż po wczesnym pit stopie Fernando Alonso, wyprowadzając na tor samochód bezpieczeństwa. Kiedy samochody jadące przed Alonso wjeżdżały pod samochód bezpieczeństwa, by zatankować, on wysunął się na czoło wyścigu i zwyciężył. Piquet Jr. został wyrzucony po Grand Prix Węgier w 2009 roku.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix Piquet Jr. crashed into Fernando Alonso's car after an early pit stop, bringing out the safety car. As the cars in front of Alonso were pitting, he moved to the front of the field and won. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Opublikowane w czwartek w magazynie Science badanie informuje o powstaniu nowego gatunku ptaków na należących do Ekwadoru Wyspach Galapagos. Naukowcy z Uniwersytetu Princeton w Stanach Zjednoczonych i Uniwersytetu w Uppsali w Szwecji ogłosili, że nowy gatunek powstał w ciągu zaledwie dwóch pokoleń, chociaż uważano, że ten proces trwa zdecydowanie dłużej na podstawie rozmnażania zięb Darwina, darwinek czarnych, darwinek kaktusowych i darwinek grubodziobych.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reports the creation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands, which are part of Ecuador. Scientists from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden announced that the new species was created in just two generations, although it was believed that the process took much longer based on the breeding of Darwin's finches, the black darwin finch, the cactus darwin finch and the thick-billed darwin finch.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: To wydarzenie artystyczne wpisuje się również w kampanię realizowaną przez Urząd miejski Bukaresztu z zamiarem promocji rumuńskiej stolicy jako miasta o kreatywnej i barwnej atmosferze. Miasto jako pierwsze w południowo-wschodniej Europie będzie gospodarzem CowParade, największego na świecie otwartego wydarzenia artystycznego, które rozpocznie się w czerwcu, a zakończy w sierpniu tego roku.
mt: This artistic event also fits into the campaign carried out by the City Hall of Bucharest with the aim of promoting the Romanian capital as a city with a creative and colorful atmosphere. The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to host CowParade, the largest open artistic event in the world, which will start in June and end in August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Samolot został skierowany do Irkucka, obsługiwały go wojska wewnętrzne. Rozpoczęto dochodzenie w celu zbadania sprawy. Samolot Ił-76 odgrywa ważną rolę w rosyjskiej flocie wojskowej, podobnie jak odgrywał w sowieckiej od lat 70. XX wieku. W zeszłym miesiącu doszło w Rosji do poważnego wypadku z jego udziałem. 7 października silnik odpadł podczas startu, obyło się bez ofiar. W wyniku tego incydentu Rosja na krótki czas odwołała wszystkie kursy samolotów Ił-76.
mt: The plane was directed to Irkutsk, it was operated by the internal forces. An investigation was started to investigate the matter. The Ilyushin Il-76 plays an important role in the Russian military fleet, as it did in the Soviet Union since the 1970s. Last month there was a serious accident involving it. On October 7, an engine failed during takeoff, there were no casualties. As a result of this incident, Russia temporarily canceled all flights of Il-76 aircraft.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Przed „Simpsonami” Simon pracował przy kilku programach, pełniąc różne stanowiska. W latach osiemdziesiątych pracował przy produkcji takich seriali jak Taxi, Cheers i Tracey Ullman Show. W 1989 roku stworzył serial „Simpsonowie” wraz z Brooksem i Groeningiem, był też odpowiedzialny za zatrudnienie pierwszego zespołu scenarzystów. Choć odszedł z serialu w 1993 roku, wciąż przysługiwał mu status producenta wykonawczego i co roku otrzymywał dziesiątki milionów dolarów w tantiemach.
mt: Before "The Simpsons" Simon worked on several programs, holding various positions. In the 1980s he worked on the production of such series as Taxi, Cheers and Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989 he created the series "The Simpsons" with Brooks and Groening, he was also responsible for hiring the first team of writers. Although he left the series in 1993, he still had the status of executive producer and every year received hundreds of millions of dollars in royalties.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke napisała, że podejmowane przez niektórych wysiłki, aby uciszyć wypowiedzi kobiet na temat ich zdrowia, okazały się fiaskiem. Doszła do tej konkluzji ze względu na wiele pozytywnych komentarzy i zachęt, które otrzymywała od kobiet i mężczyzn, wzywających do uznania środków antykoncepcyjnych za medyczną konieczność.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some to silence women's voices on their health have failed. She came to this conclusion due to many positive comments and encouragement she received from women and men, calling for the recognition of contraceptives as a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Posiada właściwości identyczne z wodą. Tak jak woda, również jest przezroczysty. Dlatego stojąc na brzegu, byłbyś w stanie zobaczyć wszystkie kamyki i maź znajdujące się na dnie. „Według aktualnego stanu wiedzy tylko jedno ciało planetarne ma dynamikę większą niż Tytan i jest to Ziemia” – dodał Stofan.
mt: It has the same properties as water. Like water, it is transparent. So standing on the shore, you would be able to see all the pebbles and mud at the bottom. "According to current knowledge only one celestial body has a greater dynamic than Titan and that is Earth" - he added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: To potwierdza, że niektóre dinozaury miały pióra, co jest popularną teorią, ale także dostarcza takich szczegółów, jak kolor i trójwymiarowy układ, czego nie można uzyskać ze skamielin. Według naukowców upierzenie tego zwierzęcia było kasztanowe na wierzchu, a pod spodem jasne lub w kolorze karotenu. Odkrycie to rzuca także światło na ewolucję piór u ptaków. W związku z tym, że pióra dinozaura nie mają dobrze rozwiniętego trzonu, zwanego stosiną, lecz mają inne cechy piór – promienie i promyki – naukowcy wywnioskowali, że stosina prawdopodobnie była późniejszym etapem ewolucyjnym niż te pozostałe cechy. Budowa piór wskazuje, że nie służyły do latania, ale do regulowania temperatury albo na pokaz. W opinii naukowców jest to upierzenie dorosłego osobnika, a nie pisklaka, mimo że ogon należał do młodego dinozaura. Badacze zasugerowali, że mimo iż jest to ogon młodego dinozaura, upierzenie próbki wskazuje na dorosłego osobnika, a nie na pisklę.
mt: This confirms that some dinosaurs had feathers, which is a popular theory, but also provides such details as color and three-dimensional arrangement, which cannot be obtained from fossils. According to scientists, the plumage of this animal was chestnut on top, and underneath it was light or carotene colored. This discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have well-developed shafts, called rachises, but have other features of feathers – barbs and barbules – scientists concluded that the rachis was probably a later stage of evolution than these other features. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. In the opinion of scientists, this is the plumage of an adult individual, not a chick, although the tail belonged to a young dinosaur. Researchers suggested that although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the plumage of the specimen indicates an adult individual, not a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

mt: This confirms that some dinosaurs had feathers, which is a popular theory, but also provides such details as color and three-dimensional arrangement, which cannot be obtained from fossils. According to scientists, the plumage of this animal was chestnut on top, and underneath it was light or carotene colored. This discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have well-developed shafts, called rachises, but have other features of feathers – barbs and barbules – scientists concluded that the rachis was probably a later stage of evolution than these other features. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. In the opinion of scientists, this is the plumage of an adult individual, not a chick, although the tail belonged to a young dinosaur. Researchers suggested that although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the plumage of the specimen indicates an adult individual, not a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Istnieje jedna eksperymentalna szczepionka, która wydaje się być w stanie obniżyć śmiertelność z powodu zakażenia wirusem Ebola, jednak do tej pory nie wykazano jednoznacznie, aby jakiekolwiek leki nadawały się do leczenia trwającej infekcji. Jeden koktajl przeciwciał, Zmapp, z początku wydawał się obiecujący, jednak formalne badania dowiodły, że nie jest on aż tak skuteczny w zapobieganiu śmierci, jak tego oczekiwano. W ramach badania PALM posłużono się ZMapp jako próbką kontrolną, czyli punktem odniesienia, do którego naukowcy porównywali trzy pozostałe metody leczenia.
mt: There is one experimental vaccine that appears to reduce mortality from Ebola infection, but so far no drugs have been proven effective in treating an ongoing infection. One cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially appeared promising, but formal studies showed it was not as effective in preventing death as had been hoped. In the PALM study, ZMapp was used as a control, or reference point, to which researchers compared three other treatment methods.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: W poniedziałek naukowcy ze Szkoły Medycznej Uniwersytetu Stanforda obwieścili wynalezienie nowego narzędzia diagnostycznego, sortującego komórki według rodzaju: jest to miniaturowy chip drukowany, który można wyprodukować za pomocą standardowych drukarek atramentowych przy koszcie szacowanym na jednego centa amerykańskiego za sztukę. Wiodący badacze utrzymują, że może to przyczynić się do wczesnego wykrywania raka, gruźlicy, wirusa HIV i malarii u pacjentów w krajach biednych, gdzie na choroby takie jak rak piersi umiera dwa razy więcej ludzi niż w krajach bogatszych.
mt: On Monday, researchers from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that sorts cells by type: a miniature chip printed using standard inkjet printers, costing about a dime per unit. Leading researchers say it could help detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in patients in poor countries, where twice as many people die from such diseases as in rich countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Uczeni odkryli na całej powierzchni księżyca formy terenu nazywane płatowatymi zboczami, które najwyraźniej powstały w wyniku bardzo wolnego kurczenia się księżyca. Te urwiska znaleziono na całym Księżycu i wyglądają na minimalnie podniszczone, wskazując na to, że zdarzenia geologiczne, które je wywołały, były stosunkowo niedawne. Ta teoria stoi w sprzeczności do twierdzenia, że księżyc jest pozbawiony jakiejkolwiek aktywności geologicznej.
mt: Scientists have discovered a type of lunar landform called lobate scarps, which appear to have been formed by very slow contraction of the moon. These scarps were found all over the moon and look minimally eroded, indicating that the geologic events that created them were relatively recent. This theory stands in contrast to the belief that the moon is devoid of any geologic activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Od tamtego czasu Adekoya jest w sądzie okręgowym w Edynburgu osobą oskarżoną o zamordowanie syna. Znajduje się w areszcie, oczekując na akt oskarżenia i proces, ale zeznania naocznych świadków mogą być mało wiarygodne, ponieważ jej wizerunek został powszechnie upubliczniony. To praktyka powszechna w innych regionach Wielkiej Brytanii, ale szkocki wymiar sprawiedliwości działa odmiennie, sądy uważają, że publikacja fotografii może być szkodliwa. Profesor Pamela Ferguson z Uniwersytetu w Dundee zauważa, że „dziennikarze wkraczają na niebezpieczne terytorium, publikując zdjęcia podejrzanych itp.”. Urząd Ławy Królewskiej, odpowiedzialny w ogólnym zakresie za prowadzenie dochodzeń, przekazał dziennikarzom, że wszelkie dalsze komentarze zostają wstrzymane przynajmniej do momentu wniesienia aktu oskarżenia.
mt: Since then Adekoya has been in the High Court in Edinburgh charged with murdering her son. She is in custody awaiting indictment and trial, but the testimony of eyewitnesses may be unreliable, as her likeness has been widely publicized. This is a common practice in other regions of Great Britain, but the Scottish justice system operates differently, courts believe that publishing photographs can be harmful. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes that “journalists are entering dangerous territory by publishing photos of suspects etc.”. The Crown Office, responsible in general for conducting investigations, told journalists that any further comments are suspended at least until the indictment is filed.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Skrajnie trudne warunki pogodowe w połączeniu z naporem lodu stanowią znaczną przeszkodę w uskutecznieniu akcji ratunkowej. Pittman zasugerował, że warunki nie poprawią się aż do przyszłego tygodnia. Pittman twierdzi, że ilość i grubość zbitego lodu od 15 lat nie sprawiły takich kłopotów statkom polującym na foki.
mt: Severe weather conditions combined with the pressure of ice are a major obstacle in the rescue operation. Pittman suggested that the conditions will not improve until next week. Pittman says the amount and thickness of the broken ice has not caused such problems for the whaling ships.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts kategorycznie odmówił udzielenia odpowiedzi na pytanie, w którym momencie jego zdaniem rozpoczyna się życie, co jest istotne pod kątem etyki aborcji, argumentując, że nieetyczne byłoby odnoszenie się do specyfiki prawdopodobnych przypadków. Kładąc nacisk na spójną linię orzeczeń Sądu Najwyższego, oświadczył jednak raz jeszcze, że wynik sprawy Roe przeciwko Wade stanowi „obowiązujące prawo kraju”. Ponadto przyznał, że wierzy w dorozumiane prawo do prywatności, na którym opierała się decyzja w sprawie Roe.
mt: Roberts categorically refused to answer the question of when in his opinion life begins, which is important in the context of the ethics of abortion, arguing that it would be unethical to refer to the specifics of probable cases. Emphasizing the consistent line of rulings by the Supreme Court, he nevertheless reiterated that the outcome of the case Roe v. Wade is "the law of the land". He also admitted that he believes in the implied right to privacy on which the decision in Roe was based.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Dokładnie o 8:46 rano nad miastem zaległa cisza, dokładnie w momencie kiedy pierwszy samolot uderzył w cel. W nocy włączono dwa słupy światła skierowane w górę. W toku są prace budowlane, a pomiędzy pięcioma nowymi drapaczami chmur powstanie tu również centrum transportowe i park pamięci.
mt: 8:46 am exactly over the city was a silence, exactly at the moment when the first plane hit the target. In the night two light poles were turned on, aimed upwards. Construction work is ongoing, and between five new skyscrapers there will be a transportation center and a memory park.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Wszystkie wejścia do jaskiń, które nazwano „siedmioma siostrami”, mają średnicę od 100 do 250 metrów (od 328 do 820 stóp). Zdjęcia w podczerwieni wskazują na różnice temperatury między dniem i nocą typowe dla jaskiń. W stosunku do okolicznego obszaru mają niższą temperaturę w dzień i wyższą w nocy. „Środowisko termiczne nie jest tu tak stabilne jak w dużych jaskiniach na Ziemi, gdzie często utrzymuje się w miarę stała temperatura, ale wynika to z tego, że mamy tu do czynienia z głębokimi otworami” – powiedział Glen Cushing z zespołu astrogeologii w agencji naukowo-badawczej United States Geological Survey (USGS) i z Uniwersytetu Północnej Arizony w Flagstaff.
mt: All of the entrances to the caves, which were named the "seven sisters," have diameters ranging from 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet).  Infrared images show temperature differences between day and night typical of caves.  Compared to the surrounding area, they have lower daytime temperatures and higher nighttime temperatures.  "The thermal environment is not as stable as in large caves on Earth, where the temperature often remains fairly constant, but this is due to the fact that we are dealing with deep pits" - said Glen Cushing of the astrogeology team at the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the University of Northern Arizona in Flagstaff.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Ten człowiek rzekomo miał wjechać w tłum uzbrojonym w materiały wybuchowe pojazdem na trzech kołach. Zatrzymano mężczyznę podejrzanego o zdetonowanie bomby, po tym jak odniósł obrażenia spowodowane wybuchem. Władze nadal nie znają jego nazwiska, choć wiedzą, że należy do ujgurskiej grupy etnicznej.
mt: This man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle into a crowd with explosives. Authorities arrested a man suspected of detonating a bomb after he was injured by the explosion. Officials still do not know his name, but they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
